phrs.translation: 正反两方面；赞成者和反对者

sentences.sentence: We weighed up the pros and cons.
Motherhood has both its pros and cons.
sentences.translation: 做母亲有其利也有其弊。

sentences.sentence: Anne Holker looks at the pros and cons of making changes to your property.
sentences.translation: 安妮·霍尔卡会研究对你的财产进行变更的利与弊。
